page.title: 09MYLOR BOATYARD
page.content:
Moorings_
At Mylor harbour there are 320 boat-moorings altogether,most of them are taken up by yachts or small pleasure craft. In spring the boat-yard is at its buisiest with the Americans coming over and buying boats with the currently strong dollar value. For the yard people the winter is the most buisiest time and for the people who do the craning it is spring and autumn.
Nearby is the Restronguet Sailing club with a flurishing membership of dingy sailors.Each season a busy calender of racing events takes place collumating with the regata.
